price: 47.Waxay yidhahdeen: Waan ku shareysan- nay  adiga iyo kuwa kula jira. Wuxuu yidhi: "Waxa idinku dhaca (khayr ama shar) waa Qaddarka Alle15; waxaadse tihiin qolo lagu imtaxaanayo (khayr iyo sharba).”
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū iṭṭayyarnā bika wabiman maʿaka qāla ṭāirukum ʿinda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanūna
translations: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen
